Vectors.Name: .syn
Vectors.Description: TCP based flood with the syn flag set to true great for unconfigured webservers

Vectors.Name: .ack
Vectors.Description: TCP based flood with the ack flag set to true great for webservers/servers with a tcp port open

Vectors.Name: .udpplain
Vectors.Description: a simple but strong udp based flood able of sending very high pps

Vectors.Name: .http
Vectors.Description: A Layer 7 HTTP flood able of bypassing high quality protection if the flags are set correctly

Vectors.Name: .xmas
Vectors.Description: A TCP Based flood with the ack,syn,psh,fin flags set to true great for bypassing some hosts

Vectors.Name: .std
Vectors.Description: A Strong but stable udp method able to hit 99% of gameservers

Vectors.Name: .hex
Vectors.Description: A udp hex flood made for bypassing.

Vectors.Name: .raw
Vectors.Description: A Raw packet udp flood capable of saturating the highest port speeds.
